page.title: 16Colwall Horticult. Society
page.content: { The Wyche and Colwall Horticultural {Society}evolved from a Home and Garden Show, first held in August 1942 at The Hill Institute, Upper Colwall. The show continued on an annual basis and outgrew its hillside home to move first to a tented site at The Downs School and more recently to the gymnasium at The Elms School. The enthusiasts who organised the show formed the society in 1967, so that gardeners in Colwall and the surrounding area could gain even more interest and pleasure from their hobby. Monthly meetings are held from Ocober to June, at which speakers (often of national repute, e.g. Percy Thrower) provide the members with much helpful information about every conceivable gardening topic. The society currently has 200 members. Garden visits and events are arranged.
